snippet.title: EA SPORTS WRC - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get behind the wheel starting November 3, 2023 on Xbox Series X/S, PlayStation®5, or PC! Pre-order* EA SPORTS WRC and receive 3-day early access, all five VIP Rally Pass seasons, and the 3x Team Apparel Pack: http://x.ea.com/77644

Get your first look at EA SPORTS™ WRC with this reveal trailer! Build the car of your dreams in the all-new official video game of the FIA World Rally Championship, the first developed by the award-winning team behind the DiRT Rally series. Design and drive your dream rally car with the debut of Builder mode, race and overcome recent events alongside real-world highlights and nostalgic throwbacks in Moments mode, or battle the elements across dirt, snow, and asphalt in the pursuit of the perfect run. 

Take to the stage and get the latest info at: https://ea.com/games/ea-sports-wrc/wrc/ 

*Conditions and restrictions apply. See https://ea.com/games/ea-sports-wrc/wrc/disclaimers for details.

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/EASPORTSWRC 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/EASPORTSWRC
Follow us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@EASPORTSWRC 
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EASPORTSWRC

#eawrc #easportswrc
